website_summaries.verdict: Modern chandelier ceiling fan that screams glamour without the huge price.
pros: It's hard to take your eyes off the stunning crystal chandelier
The ceiling fan circulates air well
cons: The crystals in the chandelier need to be cleaned regularly to maintain the glamour of the product

customer_reviews.title: I was amazed and very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Crystal Modern Ceiling fan from TropicaIFan April 26. My order arrived on time the fan looks very well made, not cheap product at all.I email the seller about some question.They quickly responding.took care of my concern right way.I was amazed and very satisfied.this kind of of business deservers my respect and my very hard work dollar THANK YOU TROPICAL FAN FOR GAINING MY TRUST
customer_reviews.author: nahla

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and Functional!
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful fan, very effective, nice size. Assembly is a little strange until you have done 1 (we ordered 3). We left the middle dangly crystal off, as it's just decorative anyway. The only issue is that the crystal cover seems to make your room look like there are yellowish spots everywhere. You can change the light setting from bright to to more natural looking though, which helps a bit. Overall, very happy with this fan.
customer_reviews.author: Legal Begal

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Well made and looks much more expensive than it is. Very quiet operation and circulates a lot of air. The remote does a lot more than I need. I am not sure how you would operate it if the remote gets damaged, that big crystal is NOT a pull chain!
customer_reviews.author: Chris R

customer_reviews.title: Mounting bracket different between two fans?
customer_reviews.text: Overall all parts included. Fan blade installation is a bit difficult but cautious screw install avoids dropping screws within the unit. My only issue was with a difference between two fans; the mounting base was different in size and bolt pattern. Where one base could not be installed as is. Instead of sending back I modified base slightly to install. Once modified worked fine. I do not know why base would have been different. I did not contact the company or seller for exchange, but 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Pegavas1

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Installed and have used for a couple months now. Install was pretty easy, but the instructions are a little confusing in parts. However, tech support is great. After two months it started to make a little bit of a buzzing as we used the fan almost constantly. When we contacted tech support, they gave some tips and said it shouldn't make the noise any longer. It worked and they even followed up after a week or two and shortly after it started to make the noise again. After telling them this, they mailed out a replacement with little to no hassle. Overall I would recommend this fan as my wife loves the look of this fan.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Pankonien

customer_reviews.title: MAGNETIC Phillips head screwdriver needed!
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost, you MUST have a magnetic Phillips head screwdriver to install fan blades! I purchased two of these fans and the first one took over 3 hours to install by a certified electrician! Directions also do NOT tell you that you need to install the remote control sensor box BEFORE final installation of fan. Beautiful look, but super bright with LED lights. Nice breeze. Overall, I’m satisfied, I just wish the directions were clear about the blade and remote control installation. It wouldn’t have taken half the time to install if instructions were clear. Hope this is helpful to someone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product support
customer_reviews.text: I had a few issues with the installation of the fan, which I included in a previous review. The company saw my review and contacted me personally about how to fix the issue as well as to see if I had any other ideas to improve the product. That's a five star rating in my book. Wish more companies would follow suit and we'd have better products out there.
customer_reviews.author: Beegs Barley

customer_reviews.title: Extremely difficult to install
customer_reviews.text: I have spent approximately 5 hours attempting installation. This is by far the hardest product I have ever tried to install. I'm pretty good with my hands and every step of the way I've been met with issues. The final part is attaching the blades. I don't know what version of Hulk they have putting those screws in but there are two screws I cannot remove. I have tried EVERYTHING. So now the entire thing is installed but I lack a blade. Save your time and money and do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lovetoshop

customer_reviews.title: Nice modern-looking fan. Normal straight-forward ceiling fan install. Has a remote, but no A23 12v battery was supplied.
customer_reviews.text: Nice modern-looking fan. Crystal elements add bling. Normal straight-forward ceiling fan install. Quiet operation. Has a remote, but no "A23" battery was supplied. The A23 battery is the small 12v battery typically used in key-less vehicle entry fobs, home security systems, garage door/gate openers, and Bluetooth headsets - easy to find at most department stores/home centers.
customer_reviews.author: Pragmatic

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the fan looks gorgeous in our space! Pictures honestly don’t do it justice. The fan blades are nice and produce a good amount of ventilation. The packaging was excellent and even comes with white glove service :) The installation could have ended up being tricky, but luckily their videos prevented us from having any issues. The customer service is superb and responds quickly to all inquiries. This is our new shop for home improvement items!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie D.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking high quality fan
customer_reviews.text: Great looking fan that looks great in our bedroom . Tropicalfan worked out slight issues that came up very fast and contacted me right away . I would recommend this beautiful quality fan to anyone interested .
customer_reviews.author: Tony B

customer_reviews.title: Low quality scratch and dent
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write this review until we were actually able to get out of the box. We are beyond the return window by several months because our moving plans changed. While the crystals looked good, one of the blades has a very visible scratch. We just realized it this week when we took it out to install. I realize that it is difficult to see the scratch from the pic, but it is visible in person. I would be happy just to have a replacement blade. If you buy this, PLEASE inspect immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fan/light, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I thoroughly enjoy the overall look of the fan/light. Looks beautiful in our bedroom. Had a question on the light settings, and customer service was so quick and easy to work with and answered my question right away. Looking forward to enjoying this light/fan for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Fan
customer_reviews.text: I really like this fan, It makes a pretty design on my walls when the light shines in. The only thing that Im not thrilled about is when the light is on it throws a yellowish patter on the wall and furniture. Would not recommend for someone with kids, as the blades are industrial
customer_reviews.author: Shazza730

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I initially had some minor issues with the install. The customer service team went above and beyond to quickly make it right. I’m impressed with the fan he fan. The shade is beautiful and the led light is bright daylight white. I’m most impressed and the quick response from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: ck

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful ceiling fan. It took 2 hours for an electrician to install it. The blades were tricky to attach and had to be put on prior to hanging the base. As other reviews stated it does cast a crazy pattern on the walls, but I’ll get used to it. The fan is super quiet which is what I was looking for, however, when you turn on the fan or light it beeps that is annoying for a bedroom light. Super pretty and elegant. So far I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Leard

customer_reviews.title: Fan was poorly constructed
customer_reviews.text: It was constructed poorly after paying to get it installed they forgot to put the switch for to circulation. I had to take it down after spending 3 hrs putting together and installing it. Time and money waisted. They don’t pay for your time or electrician.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda González

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This ceiling fan with light is of the highest quality. The light vibrates what appears to be stars off ceiling and walls and the brightness is wonderful. Remote control so fan can be used alone which is great. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Barbara K

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous ceiling fan!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this fan! It’s simply beautiful with or without the lights on. Had an electrician install the fan and he was able to install it rather quickly. Has a remote and comes with gloves to keep fingerprints off while installing. You’re going to love this fan!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kites are not replasable
customer_reviews.text: The fan quiet good quality works well. Metal blades a real pain to install. I don't like that led kites are Not replaceable it's one sided unit. Remote has a timer.
customer_reviews.author: George Pitard

customer_reviews.title: Makes room look beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This fan arrived in a very nice package. It was easy to install. I love that it has a remote so you can control the lighting in the room. The look is very elegante yet contemporary. Customer service was super helpful when I had questions.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fan. The best part of the unit for us is that it has the remote control that allowed us to install it on a single circuit/switch that we had in place for a lighting fixture and have independent control of the fan and light with the remote. The remote receiver unit was bad out of the box and the seller sent a replacement immediately. I also requested a chip to have the unit come on only at the brightest level and they are going to provide that as well. Very responsive and accommodating seller.
customer_reviews.author: Mariannelynde

customer_reviews.title: 1.5 star
customer_reviews.text: Too late to return bc I've went through the headache of installing it. Its oretty but the light makes the room spotty yellow. I dislike the major shadows and lighting it casts.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn coleman

customer_reviews.title: Cast yellows shades over room.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty light fan, but was difficult to install and when the light is on, it cast a yellow tint through out the room from the color and shape of the light fixture if it hadn't been so difficult to install, I would return it an get a different one that I also liked for less money.
customer_reviews.author: Melody bennit

customer_reviews.title: Classy and elegant
customer_reviews.text: Great fan, very nice looking. Installing the fan blades are a challenge use a magnetic tip screw driver this will help.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip I.

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan. Was of great help through this very humid summer
customer_reviews.author: Rachel B

customer_reviews.title: Strong air
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this fan!!! Yes-it’s pretty-but it makes some major air!! On high, it sounds like a jet taking off. I’m about to order 2-3 for my new house!
customer_reviews.author: Juli I

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and quite fan
customer_reviews.text: Nice and good looking fan. The seller sent all the parts needed. In Fact they sent gloves to prevent the short circuit of LED panel or to save hands from cuts with sharp steel blades. Easy to install and fan is quite. One concern is that there will be dark shadows in the room due to crystal light fixture dome. It took us a week to get used to it. Now its not noticable.
customer_reviews.author: Vamshi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful fan. Very elegant. It was extremely difficult to install. It still has a rubbing sound when the fan runs, but it’s not too loud. Worth the money paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly E Petter

customer_reviews.title: Cool look
customer_reviews.text: Fan is beautiful. It has metal blades, so don't want to touch while running!!! Important so more to put together, but everyone loves
customer_reviews.author: molinagirl

customer_reviews.title: A+ Company
customer_reviews.text: This is fan is absolutely stunning and very sturdy construction but better is this company's service. I bought this fan over 7 months ago. I recently asked where I could buy a replacement remote and the company responded with in minutes and is sending me q replacement free of charge. FREE!!! This far exceed my expectations. Thank you Tropicalfan!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn L.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful to look at, but HORRIBLE when turned on :-(
customer_reviews.text: It actually looks beautiful just don’t turn it on. Once you flip the switch the happiness quickly fades away. No matter which of the 3 settings you choose for lighting, they’re all horrible. It makes you feel like your walking into a concert. The strobe lighting effect takes the elegance of the lighting away. If I could return I I would. It’s a little hard to return something you’ve already put together and hung. I hate it because it really is beautiful to look at. But that’s all :-(.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, find another fan!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very expensive fan, and is extremely cheaply made. I was very disappointed in this fan and the pictures make it appear much larger than what it actually is. It's made in China, looks cheap and is flimsy and costs almost $300! Returned!
customer_reviews.author: honeybees

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t say how to change direction of the fan and can’t stop wobbling.
customer_reviews.text: How can you switch the direction of the fan? No info. On that! Can’t get fan to stop wobbling!!
customer_reviews.author: JASON R.

customer_reviews.title: Returned.
customer_reviews.text: Blades are very heavy and sharp. Not safe for my living space. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Passey

customer_reviews.title: have 4 of these
customer_reviews.text: electrician installs them - he has had no complaints on difficulty they are a beautiful addition to our crystal chandeliers
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia F.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but smaller than imagined
customer_reviews.text: blades of fan was difficult to assemble. Blades came off when placed on and almost injured someone. He had to screw shades in fan. Beautiful looking after all assembled but smaller than I imagined.
customer_reviews.author: Walter D.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Loved the ceiling fan. It is stunning. Would have gotten the 52. I got the 42. Would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Not very bright
customer_reviews.text: It’s Beautiful but you will get a glare from the lights on your walls.. not very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dazzling!
customer_reviews.text: I had my fan professionally installed in the family room and it is absolutely beautiful. The assembly was quick. I thought the crystal dome would be heavy, but it is extremely lightweight which is a plus. It cools very well.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous piece
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and is going to look amazing in my room. Just finished painting room...lights are next.
customer_reviews.author: monkeyboy

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fan. They crystal is gorgeous. The blades are a thin metal.
customer_reviews.author: Missa Hollis Brizendine

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this light/fan. I had an electrician install it but only because those skills are not in my wheelhouse.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Marcellus

customer_reviews.title: In my bed room I did not need the extended arm, due to lower ceilings installed without.
customer_reviews.text: After recently repainting my bedroom this was the perfect finishing touch! Adding just the right amount of glam! 100% in love with the finished look!
customer_reviews.author: Erin M Dubel

customer_reviews.title: Fancy Ceiling Fan
customer_reviews.text: The Ceiling Fan looks great. And the power is awesome. Had issue with remote but the seller responded quickly and sent a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K

customer_reviews.title: THE CEILING FAN LIGHT WON'T COME ON
customer_reviews.text: THE LIGHT WON'T COME ON, BUT THE FAN STILL WORKS, PLEASE SUPPLY ME WITH A PHONE NUMBER SO THAT I CAN CONTACT YOU
customer_reviews.author: Raymond kirkland

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It is very bright but I am completely fine with that. It is beautiful and came at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Katie russman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is beautiful. I had a difficult time installing initially but the customer service was EXCELLENT. Gorgeous! Quiet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Aviance
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this ceiling fan. I wanted an “ BLING” look for my bedroom and this fan hit the spot. When the fan & light are both on it gives a disco feel
customer_reviews.author: Mattie Bogan

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan
customer_reviews.text: The fan arrived on time. Only a short time after I ordered it. It is a great fan. Very well made. Customer support is excellent as well. I love the beautiful chandelier light. It lights up the room wonderfully. Great experience all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Kindgren

customer_reviews.title: Small and Cool
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice fan small and perfect for a average sized room it really gives a nice breeze
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Very Small
customer_reviews.text: Very small fan. Ok for babys room but not regular space.
customer_reviews.author: Reggie R.

customer_reviews.title: GORG!
customer_reviews.text: Very Shiny and Elegant, but be careful with the blades. They're very sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Specialty Events!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful look
customer_reviews.text: I love the look I just wish I paid attention to the LED lighting but it is Beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Scott

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet. Great lighting
customer_reviews.text: Very well worth it. Very quiet. Lights have different colors
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan
customer_reviews.text: Loved the speed and design. It was a little pricy for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Blades hard to install Makes a bit of wind noise
customer_reviews.author: David Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great for a kids room!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a toddlers room. The fan has great circulation and a lot of bright light.
customer_reviews.author: Terp1856

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The fan is even more beautiful in person, sturdy material. Tropical fan's customer service is great! Would definitely recommend product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra sanchez

customer_reviews.title: I love the fan it's absolutely gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I love the fan it's absolutely gorgeous, the only thing I really don't care for is the size, it's very small.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Crooked led lights
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fan, very well made ceiling fan and they are a great company to deal with
customer_reviews.author: Reagan Jaramillo

customer_reviews.title: beautiful but gets noisy after awhile
customer_reviews.text: Love the aesthetics of the ceiling fan. The crystals are gorgeous and the settings are necessary. However, after the fan has been left on for hours, it starts to make a loud noise that disturbs my sleep. I'm not sure if I have a defective product or that is the fan.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel London

customer_reviews.title: The fan looks amazing in my bedroom
customer_reviews.text: The fan looks amazing in my bedroom.. I love the everything about it... the fan is quiet and fast and the sparkling lights give a disco ball affect at night.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love this fan!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful fan for a room with regular ceilings. I think it would be to small for rooms with tall ceilings or for large rooms. The first one we received didn’t have instructions, but the seller quickly rectified that problem, so we give them 5 stars on their customer service. The installation did take several hours, but definitely worth the time.
customer_reviews.author: CBS

customer_reviews.title: Blade issues for this fan
customer_reviews.text: Fan was easy to install. Light area was nice but did a weird pattern on the walls when light was turned on. Item was returned because of blade. Blade is made of metal and this fan was for our 8 year old daughter who likes to do gymnastics on her bed and everywhere else. Blade also looked too modern/industrial for the light area. It just did not go together. For some reason I thought the blade was going to be clear plastic (acrylic). That was originally what I was searching for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This fan is really beautiful. It’s on the smaller size but perfect for ...
customer_reviews.text: This fan is really beautiful. It’s on the smaller size but perfect for your average size bedroom. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is it one of the more difficult fans I’ve ever installed & the directions are terrible (including misspellings, grammatical errors & just vague directions). Make sure to install the blades before you install on the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Lepley

customer_reviews.title: I love the look and the fan works great but the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and the fan works great but the color shows through the shade and makes a print on the walls and everything else in the room when turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: it has a nice looking but super small and look like a toy
customer_reviews.text: it has a nice looking but super small and look like a toy! it may look better in a small office area.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous.  Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! Better than expected! Hangs over bed in master bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Kim J

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful. Unfortunately, the blades aren't as long as described and the remote didn't come with battery as described.
customer_reviews.author: constance harris

customer_reviews.title: Beware it may be defective
customer_reviews.text: Product was defective. Luckily we were paying en electrician to install and he was able to dismantle the housing and reassemble properly. He specifically told us that it was manufactured improperly. The blades on this fan are so incredibly sharp. We put it in our daughter’s room and it’s lovely but if I’d seen it in person beforehand I would not have purchased the fan. I will have to purchase rubber to go around the blade edges. As mentioned in other views the light is very bright and fluorescent and the fan is rather small, even my six year old noticed. It s very pretty however and casts beautiful shadows in my daughter’s walls. She loved the fan.
customer_reviews.author: mcshee of htown

customer_reviews.title: Really moves the air around the room!!
customer_reviews.text: There is never a day where I don’t use it!! Stands out just enough in my huge living room!! Makes sure the whole room stays cool!!
customer_reviews.author: Cleos World

customer_reviews.title: good product and great deal.
customer_reviews.text: very classy and well made product.bought it for new living room. looks really good, works good; our electricican installed it, so dont have any idea if it was difficult to install. it was packaged in a very secure packaging,
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this fan/light is amazing! It has three different light color settings and three fan speed settings. The fan is super strong and looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: K. Talajour

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price and too small
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product! For the cost very over priced. Installed and never could get to balance right. Took it down and it is now sitting on the garage.
customer_reviews.author: TerrePolite

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous fan
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous and elegant, effective at cooling but whisper quiet and well balanced. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Middleton Sarna

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. Not your standard ceiling fan look! Nice detail. Only drawback is that the rod and ceiling cover are brushed nickel instead of the matching polished look in the description.
customer_reviews.author: EPM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very very pretty and nice fan , just dont love the LED light but is gorgeous and works well
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Gosselink

product_meta.title: Tropicalfan Crystal Modern Ceiling Fan Remote Control Home Decoration Living Room Dinner Room Simple LED Mute Electric Fans Chandeliers 4 Stainless Steel Blades 44 Inch
product_meta.description:
About Tropicalfan

A Professional Brand Sells High-Quality Ceiling Fan Chandelier And Provides Superb Customer Service.The Quality And Service Are Safe Guaranteed And Reliable.
Tropical Fan Has Plenty Of Kinds Ceiling Fan To Satisfy Every Need And Interest.

Tropicalfan Ceiling Fan Chandelier Features

① Energy Saving:Pure Copper,Circulates A Lot Of Air,Protect Family From Air-Condition
② Stunning Crystal : High-Quality K9 Crystal, Modern Gorgeous And An Eye Catcher.
③ Well Balanced:Durable Metal Canopy And Down Rod Make The Fan Well Balanced And Safe.
④ Well Packed:Use Eps Shock-Proof Foam Box To Protect Item From Damaged In Transit.
⑤ Great Custom Service:Quick Follow Up to Customers’ Questions.

Crystal Ceiling Fan Specifications

Function: Illumination,Fan wind,Decoration
Installation Method:Down Rod Mount
Light Source:LED Chip (Included)
Controller type:Remote Control 
Battery for the Remote:12V A23 (included)
Material:Metal,Crystal 
Suggestion Room:90-180 sq. Ft (Small Room,44 Inch fan only)

What is in box

4 x Blade, 2 x Downrod, 1 x Canopy, 1 x Motor, 1 x Mounting Bracelet,1 x Lampshade,1 x Screws Pack,,1 x Remote Control,1 x Manual

Installation

The instructiona and installation video specific for the fan are provided,You can refer to install easily.If you have not any installation experience,You can hire a electrician.
feature_bullets: 【DESIGN STYLE】:crystal lampshade and 4 stainless steel blades with satin natural silver finish provide the cool ceiling fan a sleek and modern look.the 44 inch small ceiling fan only perfect for small living room,dinning room,bedroom,office.
【QUIET, DURABLE MOTOR】:motor made from copper delivers powerful air movement and quiet performance,with heat sink hole,it can reduce the internal temperature of the host,extend the life of motor.

【3 SPEED,3 LIGHT,REMOTE】:the low profile ceiling fan provides 3 fan speeds (high/medium/low) and 3 color changing light (white/neutral/warm);operate fan speed and lights by remote control with timing function.

【DETAIL and MATERIAL】:battery included.light source:led chip,low power consumption and long service life.with a 4.72 inch and a 9.84 inch down rod (can be customized for free).very thin metal blade and crystal lampshade.crafts:metal polishing,sturdy and durable,anti-corrosion.

【100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED】:100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED:manufacturer's and seller combination warranty,30 days money back warranty,1-year unlimited warranty for replacement!please click “contact seller” or send mail to lianrui2017@hotmail.com if you have any question.we are 100% dedicated to your satisfaction.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars148 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
